data.Question: How do you raise awareness among your employees about personal data protection? What percentage of employees have been made aware of data protection this year?
data.Commentaire: Awareness session for all employees to come (end of year)

data.Question: If you have a person responsible for IS security, please specify the contact?
How do you raise awareness among your employees about IS security? What percentage of employees have been made aware of IS security this year?
data.Commentaire:
2 levels of awareness:
 - Developers are made aware of secure development - Recently completed
 - All employees will follow a training session by end of year
-> To date, approximately 20% of employees trained

data.Question: List the security policies in force in your organization?
data.Commentaire:
PGSSI
PSSI
Vulnerability management
Incident management
Business continuity management
Security acceptance checklist
IS control plan
Password policy
Data classification
Change management

data.Question: Does the solution include a backup solution and exportable to the client?
data.Commentaire: The client can export all their data via export functions. The provider can, on request, provide all data in JSON format

data.Question: Is the solution compatible with identity management solutions in API mode?
Does the solution natively support ADFS or SAML authentication?
Does the solution offer integrated MFA authentication (not to be confused with enterprise MFA)?
If the solution or application has a native mechanism for verifying malicious files/attachments, please specify the solution used?

If the application has been tested and reviewed in terms of security by a provider, please specify the date of the last evaluation(s)? Specify if the provider(s) have a qualification (e.g. PASSI, ...)?
data.Commentaire:
The last penetration test was performed recently.
The provider does not have PASSI qualification

data.Question: Is the solution monitored by a SOC, if yes internal or external?
data.Commentaire: The SOC project is in progress and should be completed soon

data.Question: Is the solution hosted in EU? If yes, who is the host and in which country?
data.Commentaire: The solution is hosted in France (French hosts). We have a SecNumCloud offering also in France

data.Question: What types of data are transferred or processed outside the EU?
If the solution uses third-party services or suppliers, please specify which ones and why?
data.Commentaire: Third-party services are limited to hosting service (see previous answers)

data.Question: Is the solution capable of pushing logs or events to a SIEM or SOC?
What is the retention period for data planned online (default setting)? If yes, is it configurable?
data.Commentaire: The online data retention period is not configurable and corresponds to 3 years or contract duration + 60 days

data.Question: After how long is data deleted (online, backups, and archives)?
data.Commentaire:
In case of termination, or at client request, all data related to the client is deleted. This includes:
 - Production data;
 - All backups associated with the client.

Data will however remain in encrypted backups until their expiration date (60 days).

data.Question: If the solution requires sending emails (e.g. notifications), can we limit IP addresses or use a client email account?
data.Commentaire: To date, we cannot provide fixed IPs on this service. However all our emails come from an address of our company.
